label: Task-17
title: Type_safe bool values don't need to be assigned to False
description:
like here 

class Schema__Node__Response(Type_Safe):                                          # Node response wrapper
    success : bool             = False                                            # Operation success flag
    node    : Schema__Node     = None                                             # The loaded node (if found)
    message : Safe_Str__Text                                                      # Error/status message


since they are already auto assigned that

also null values should only be assigned if we really want that value to be null

node    : Schema__Node     = None 

which might be ok in this case (or not)

Note that Type_Safe tries to assign the default value of that type (if it can be created)
